title: Yellowstone National Park: Education
body: Yellowstone: Wilderness Classroom Containing half of the world's geothermal features, and bursting with wildlife, Yellowstone provides for one-of-a-kind classroom-based or experiential education. Whether your class is in the park, or visiting online, unique opportunities for learning and adventure await your students. Here you can learn about using the park as a classroom, plan field trips, or participate in distance learning.                  Curriculum for Your Classroom We've created these lesson plans to help you teach students about Yellowstone's unique geology and hydrothermal features, wildlife and more.
